text: CLOSE At the second season premiere of ` ` Marvelous Mrs. Maisel'' in New York, actress Rachel Brosnahan and showrunner Amy Sherman - Palladino say they're not chasing awards for their hit show. ( Nov. 30 ) AP Rachel Brosnahan as Midge Maisel on ` ` The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel.'' ( Photo : Amazon ) It's not easy to pull off marvelous a second time around. Amazon's ` ` The Marvelous Mrs. Maisel'' returns for its second season Wednesday, fresh from winning eight Emmy Awards, including outstanding comedy and actress in a comedy, for star Rachel Brosnahan.
